# matrixfun ðŸŽ‰ðŸ“Š

A fun and sassy Python matrix multiplication library that makes linear algebra tolerable (and funny).

## Installation

```bash
pip install matrixfun
```

## Usage

```python
from matrixfun import multiply_matrices

A = [[1, 2], [3, 4]]
B = [[5], [6]]

result = multiply_matrices(A, B)
print(result)
```
